body_html:
@pytorchbot test this please

Yes, what you should do is find tests that currently exercise torch/utils/data/sampler.py and add your test there, in the same local style. One way to find this out is to make the function purposely fail and then run the test suite to see what fails.

body:
@pytorchbot test this please

Yes, what you should do is find tests that currently exercise torch/utils/data/sampler.py and add your test there, in the same local style. One way to find this out is to make the function purposely fail and then run the test suite to see what fails.
